sentences.en: A cut - glass object, such as a pendant of a chandelier.
sentences.cn: 刻花玻璃物体如枝形吊灯的玻璃吊灯架.

sentences.en: Button shaped beads pendant , Earing, a meson, welcome to order!
sentences.cn: 异型纽扣珠吊坠,耳钉, 介子一套, 欢迎订货!

sentences.en: Facetted clear crystal heart pendant on black waxed cotton cord.
sentences.cn: 在上雕琢平面的清楚水晶心脏垂饰在黑被打蜡的棉花绳子.

sentences.en: Most of customers would buy the pendant after wearing it.
sentences.cn: 大部分试戴过这一款坠子的客人都会购买它.

sentences.en: Rhodium - plated rounded square pendant in clear crystal pav é on gold - plated chain.
sentences.cn: 铑被镀的被环绕的方形垂饰在清楚水晶铺在金子被镀的链子.

sentences.en: She liked necklaces made of turquoise, and long pendant earrings.
sentences.cn: 她喜欢绿宝石项链, 及长坠饰耳环.

sentences.en: Suitable for both steel pipe and cable wiring, pendant and socket type.
sentences.cn: 钢管或电缆布线, 吊杆式,座式安装均可.

sentences.en: Suitable for pendant lamp and also be used in circuit.
sentences.cn: 适用于吊灯也可用在线路中.

sentences.en: The jade pendant she wears was given by her grandma.
sentences.cn: 她身上的这块佩玉是奶奶送给她的.

sentences.en: The pendant goes with the necklace you are wearing fabulously.
sentences.cn: 这个挂件与你戴着的那条项链十分匹配.

sentences.en: The pendant was hanging by a thin gold chain.
sentences.cn: 那耳环是由一根细金链子吊着的.

sentences.en: This circular pendant symbolizing harmony and eternity is both timeless and classic.
sentences.cn: 本通告挂件,象征着永恒的和谐,既是永恒经典.

sentences.en: Trading company, mainly to hardware categories: lighting, bathroom pendant, as cutting tools.
sentences.cn: 贸易公司, 以五金类为主: 灯饰 、 浴室挂件 、 刀具等.

sentences.en: Well, a good place to hang a pendant or a tie.
sentences.cn: 嗯, 脖子是个挂项链吊坠或打领带的好地方.

words.tran_cn: 悬而未决的；下垂的；未定的；向外伸出的

trans.tran_en: a jewel, stone etc that hangs from a thin chain that you wear around your neck
